Description:
OPENTEXT - THE INFORMATION COMPANY

As the Information Company, our mission at OpenText is to create software solutions and deliver services that redefine the future of digital. Be part of a winning team that leads the way in Enterprise Information Management. The Opportunity:
 The Sr. Cloud Network Engineer will provide project-oriented network configuration and design, utilizing best practices for enterprise datacenter infrastructure. Working in a collaborative environment, the engineer will suggest and implement solutions relating to all aspects of a highly complex network infrastructure to see all assigned projects through to completion.
 Your great at:
 Plan, design, document and implement solutions to the networking needs of the business.
Coordinate hardware and software upgrades while working with key stakeholders.
Provide support of routers, switches, firewalls and load balancers (physical and virtual).
Plan and recommend design that could improve the existing network environment.
Implement networking best practices and standards throughout the infrastructure.
Create and update documentation (to include Visio diagrams) relating to all implementations.
Understanding of ITIL process including change and incident process.
24x7 on call work outside of these hours.What it takes:Minimum 5 Years of experience in complex network implementation/support
Hands on in F5 Load Balancer LTM, Certificate management, Routers, Switches, Firewalls, Load Balancers (Multivendor Network Environment) like Cisco Nexus , FortiGate, Checkpoint, PaloAlto, Juniper
Must have Network Skills & Concepts: 
TCP/IP, routing protocols (EIGRP, OSPF, BGP, MPLS, IPSec VPN), Layer2/3 switching and VLAN configuration, Firewall security policy.
Routing Protocols: EIGRP, BGP, DMVPN, OSPF.
Trunking Protocols: VLAN, SVI, 802.1q, LACP, vPC
Good understanding on Spine and Leaf
Troubleshooting through TCP/IP packet capture analysis
Experience in Hyperscalers (AWS, Azure, GCP.) and Cloud networking.
Experience in Automation using Python, Terraform, Ansible
Understating of Network Virtualization (VMware NSX-T)
Desired Certifications (not mandatory):
Cisco CCNA Data Center
Cisco CCNP Data Center
GCP/AWS or Azure CertificationOpenText's efforts to build an inclusive work environment go beyond simply complying with applicable laws.
